abstract: Jurors in Pedro Hernandez murder case are shown video of interview with Jose A Ramos after he had been arrested for trying to lure two boys into tunnel in Van Cortlandt Park; defense lawyers for Hernandez, who is accused of kidnapping and and killing 6-year-old Etan Patz in 1979, are trying to implicate Ramos as alternative culprit.
lead_paragraph: Defense presented a grainy video of an interview with Jose A. Ramos in an effort to convince the jury that another man killed the Etan Patz.

headline.main: Defense at Patz Trial Presents Jury With Alternate Suspect, via an Old Video
headline.print_headline: Defense at Patz Trial Presents Jury With Alternate Suspect, via an Old Video

snippet: Defense presented a grainy video of an interview with Jose A. Ramos in an effort to convince the jury that another man killed the Etan Patz.
